data.name: SDFJKL_Disabled
data.value: Switching to Braille display input mode.

data.name: Tips
data.value: Welcome to this beta version! This game aims to help you discover and practice Japanese Braille. For this, you will need to use a Braille display, as well as a screen reader that supports it, configured to use the unified French 8-point Braille table. Here's an overview of the commands that will be useful to you: The arrow keys are used to navigate through menus, Enter to select, Escape to quit. F2 and F3 are used to adjust the music volume. You can read this information again at any time by pressing F1 or in the main menu.

data.name: Basic_practice_tips
data.value: You will hear a character, then you must type the corresponding symbol on your Braille display. Careful! You only have one attempt!

data.name: Choice_practice_tips
data.value: This training is the easiest. You will hear a character, then 4 Braille signs will be displayed. You must choose which one corresponds by pressing the numbers 1-4. To hear the sign again, press 0.
